verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- And the word שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <S%H8050><s%> she-mu-'El of Samuel לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol to all יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; came to all Israel וַיֵּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze went out יִשְׂרָאֵל֩ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El Now Israel לִקְרַ֨את <S%H7122><s%> lik-Rat to meet פְּלִשְׁתִּ֜ים <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim the Philistines לַמִּלְחָמָ֗ה <S%H4421><s%> lam-mil-cha-Mah, to battle וַֽיַּחֲנוּ֙ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- beside הָאֶ֣בֶן ha-'E-ven הָעֵ֔זֶר <S%H72><s%> ha-'E-zer, beside Ebenezer וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> u-fe-lish-Tim and the Philistines חָנ֥וּ <S%H2583><s%> cha-Nu pitched בַאֲפֵֽק׃ <S%H663><s%> va-'a-Fek. in Aphek

וַיַּעַרְכ֨וּ <S%H6186><s%> vai-ya-'ar-Chu put themselves in array פְלִשְׁתִּ֜ים <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim And the Philistines לִקְרַ֣את <S%H7122><s%> lik-Rat to meet יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, Israel וַתִּטֹּשׁ֙ <S%H5203><s%> vat-tit-Tosh and when they joined הַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> ham-mil-cha-Mah, battle וַיִּנָּ֥גֶף <S%H5062><s%> vai-yin-Na-gef was smitten יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El Israel לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before פְלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim; the Philistines וַיַּכּ֤וּ <S%H5221><s%> vai-yak-Ku and they slew בַמַּֽעֲרָכָה֙ <S%H4634><s%> vam-ma-'a-ra-Chah of the army בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> bas-sa-Deh, in the field כְּאַרְבַּ֥עַת <S%H702><s%> ke-'ar-Ba-'at about four אֲלָפִ֖ים <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim thousand אִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish. men

וַיָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo were come הָעָם֮ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am And when the people אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into הַֽמַּחֲנֶה֒ <S%H4264><s%> ham-ma-cha-Neh into the camp וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru said זִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> zik-Nei the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel לָ֣מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Lam-mah Why נְגָפָ֧נוּ <S%H5062><s%> ne-ga-Fa-nu smitten יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh Wherefore hath the LORD הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom us to day לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before פְלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim; Philistine נִקְחָ֧ה <S%H3947><s%> nik-Chah accept אֵלֵ֣ינוּ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-nu to מִשִּׁלֹ֗ה <S%H7887><s%> mish-shi-Loh, out of Shiloh אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲרוֹן֙ <S%H727><s%> 'a-rOn the ark בְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> be-Rit of the covenant יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD וְיָבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> ve-ya-Vo unto us that when it cometh בְקִרְבֵּ֔נוּ <S%H7130><s%> ve-kir-Be-nu, among וְיֹשִׁעֵ֖נוּ <S%H3467><s%> ve-yo-shi-'E-nu us it may save מִכַּ֥ף <S%H3709><s%> mik-Kaf us out of the hand אֹיְבֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-Vei-nu. of our enemies

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach sent הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am So the people שִׁלֹ֔ה <S%H7887><s%> shi-Loh, to Shiloh וַיִּשְׂא֣וּ <S%H5375><s%> vai-yis-'U that they might bring מִשָּׁ֗ם <S%H8033><s%> mish-Sham, there אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲר֧וֹן <S%H727><s%> a-Ron from thence the ark בְּרִית־ <S%H1285><s%> be-rit- of the covenant יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot of hosts יֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev which dwelleth הַכְּרֻבִ֑ים <S%H3742><s%> hak-ke-ru-Vim; [between] the cherubims וְשָׁ֞ם <S%H8033><s%> ve-Sham there שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei and the two בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- sons עֵלִ֗י <S%H5941><s%> 'e-Li, of Eli עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with אֲרוֹן֙ <S%H727><s%> 'a-rOn [were] there with the ark בְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> be-Rit of the covenant הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God חָפְנִ֖י <S%H2652><s%> cha-fe-Ni Hophni וּפִֽינְחָֽס׃ <S%H6372><s%> u-Fi-ne-Chas. and Phinehas

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, become כְּב֨וֹא <S%H935><s%> ke-Vo came אֲר֤וֹן <S%H727><s%> a-Ron And when the ark בְּרִית־ <S%H1285><s%> be-rit- of the covenant יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <S%H4264><s%> ham-ma-cha-Neh, into the camp וַיָּרִ֥עוּ <S%H7321><s%> vai-ya-Ri-'u shouted כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El all Israel תְּרוּעָ֣ה <S%H8643><s%> te-ru-'Ah shout גְדוֹלָ֑ה <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lah; with a great וַתֵּהֹ֖ם <S%H1949><s%> vat-te-Hom rang again הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. so that the earth

וַיִּשְׁמְע֤וּ <S%H8085><s%> vai-yish-me-'U heard פְלִשְׁתִּים֙ <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim And when the Philistines אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol the noise הַתְּרוּעָ֔ה <S%H8643><s%> hat-te-ru-'Ah, of the shout וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-me-Ru, they said מֶ֠ה <S%H4100><s%> meh What ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol What [meaneth] the noise הַתְּרוּעָ֧ה <S%H8643><s%> hat-te-ru-'Ah shout הַגְּדוֹלָ֛ה <S%H1419><s%> hag-ge-do-Lah of this great הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot in בְּמַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> be-ma-cha-Neh in the camp הָעִבְרִ֑ים <S%H5680><s%> ha-'iv-Rim; of the Hebrews וַיֵּ֣דְע֔וּ <S%H3045><s%> vai-Ye-de-'U, understood כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki that אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> a-Ron that the ark יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD בָּ֖א <S%H935><s%> ba was come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into הַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> Ham-ma-cha-Neh. into the camp

וַיִּֽרְאוּ֙ <S%H3372><s%> vai-yir-'U were afraid הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> hap-pe-lish-Tim, And the Philistines כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אָמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> 'a-me-Ru, for they said בָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> ba is come אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4264><s%> ham-ma-cha-Neh; into the camp וַיֹּאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru And they said א֣וֹי <S%H188><s%> o Woe לָ֔נוּ La-nu, כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki For לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo nothing הָיְתָ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-ye-Tah has happened כָּזֹ֖את <S%H2063><s%> ka-Zot likewise אֶתְמ֥וֹל <S%H865><s%> et-Mol before time שִׁלְשֹֽׁם׃ <S%H8032><s%> shil-Shom. before that time

א֣וֹי <S%H188><s%> o Woe לָ֔נוּ La-nu, מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who יַצִּילֵ֔נוּ <S%H5337><s%> yatz-tzi-Le-nu, unto us who shall deliver מִיַּ֛ד <S%H3027><s%> mi-Yad us out of the hand הָאֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him are the gods הָאַדִּירִ֖ים <S%H117><s%> ha-'ad-di-Rim of these mighty הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh; of these אֵ֧לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh of these הֵ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> hem like הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, are the gods הַמַּכִּ֧ים <S%H5221><s%> ham-mak-Kim that smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִצְרַ֛יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim the Egyptians בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all מַכָּ֖ה <S%H4347><s%> mak-Kah with all the plagues בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> bam-mid-Bar. in the wilderness

הִֽתְחַזְּק֞וּ <S%H2388><s%> hit-chaz-ze-Ku Be strong וִֽהְי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> vih-Yu and quit לַֽאֲנָשִׁים֙ <S%H376><s%> la-'a-na-Shim and be men פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim, O ye Philistines פֶּ֚ן <S%H6435><s%> pen or תַּעַבְד֣וּ <S%H5647><s%> ta-'av-Du that ye be not servants לָעִבְרִ֔ים <S%H5680><s%> la-'iv-Rim, unto the Hebrews כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after עָבְד֖וּ <S%H5647><s%> 'a-ve-Du as they have been לָכֶ֑ם la-Chem; וִהְיִיתֶ֥ם <S%H1961><s%> vih-yi-Tem to you quit לַאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H376><s%> la-'a-na-Shim therefore be men וְנִלְחַמְתֶּֽם׃ <S%H3898><s%> ve-nil-cham-Tem. and fight

וַיִּלָּחֲמ֣וּ <S%H3898><s%> vai-yil-la-cha-Mu fought פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim, And the Philistines וַיִּנָּ֤גֶף <S%H5062><s%> vai-yin-Na-gef was smitten יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El and Israel וַיָּנֻ֙סוּ֙ <S%H5127><s%> vai-ya-Nu-su and they fled אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every man לְאֹהָלָ֔יו <S%H168><s%> le-'o-ha-Lav, into his tent וַתְּהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vat-te-Hi become הַמַּכָּ֖ה <S%H4347><s%> ham-mak-Kah slaughter גְּדוֹלָ֣ה <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lah great מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od; and there was a very וַיִּפֹּל֙ <S%H5307><s%> vai-yip-Pol for there fell מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> mi-Yis-ra-'El, of Israel שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> she-lo-Shim thirty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef thousand רַגְלִֽי׃ <S%H7273><s%> rag-Li. footmen

וַאֲר֥וֹן <S%H727><s%> va-'a-Ron And the ark אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him of God נִלְקָ֑ח <S%H3947><s%> nil-Kach; was taken וּשְׁנֵ֤י <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Nei and the two בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- sons עֵלִי֙ <S%H5941><s%> 'e-Li of Eli מֵ֔תוּ <S%H4191><s%> Me-tu, were slain חָפְנִ֖י <S%H2652><s%> cha-fe-Ni Hophni וּפִֽינְחָֽס׃ <S%H6372><s%> u-Fi-ne-Chas. and Phinehas

וַיָּ֤רָץ <S%H7323><s%> vai-Ya-rotz And there ran אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> 'ish- a man בִּנְיָמִן֙ <S%H1144><s%> bin-ya-Min of Benjamin מֵהַמַּ֣עֲרָכָ֔ה <S%H4634><s%> me-ham-Ma-'a-ra-Chah, out of the army וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo and came שִׁלֹ֖ה <S%H7887><s%> shi-Loh to Shiloh בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom the same day הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu; the same וּמַדָּ֣יו <S%H4055><s%> u-mad-Dav with his clothes קְרֻעִ֔ים <S%H7167><s%> ke-ru-'Im, rent וַאֲדָמָ֖ה <S%H127><s%> va-'a-da-Mah and with earth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on רֹאשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H7218><s%> ro-Sho. upon his head

וַיָּב֗וֹא <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo, And when he came וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh behold עֵ֠לִי <S%H5941><s%> 'E-li lo Eli יֹשֵׁ֨ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev sat עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הַכִּסֵּ֜א <S%H3678><s%> hak-kis-Se upon a seat; יַךְ yach כיַ֥ד <S%H5221><s%> Yad beat קדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <S%H1870><s%> de-rech the road מְצַפֶּ֔ה <S%H6822><s%> me-tzap-Peh, watching כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- because הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah become לִבּוֹ֙ <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bo for his heart חָרֵ֔ד <S%H2730><s%> cha-Red, trembled עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al for אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> a-Ron for the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him; of God וְהָאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-ha-'Ish, And when the man בָּ֚א <S%H935><s%> ba came לְהַגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> le-hag-Gid and told בָּעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> ba-'Ir, into the city וַתִּזְעַ֖ק <S%H2199><s%> vat-tiz-'Ak cried out כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all הָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir. [it] all the city

וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> vai-yish-Ma' heard עֵלִי֙ <S%H5941><s%> 'e-Li And when Eli אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol the noise הַצְּעָקָ֔ה <S%H6818><s%> hatz-tze-'a-Kah, of the crying וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer he said מֶ֛ה <S%H4100><s%> meh What ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol What [meaneth] the noise הֶהָמ֖וֹן <S%H1995><s%> he-ha-Mon commotion הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh; of this וְהָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-ha-'Ish the man מִהַ֔ר <S%H4116><s%> mi-Har, in hastily וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo came וַיַּגֵּ֥ד <S%H5046><s%> vai-yag-Ged and told לְעֵלִֽי׃ <S%H5941><s%> le-'e-Li.
